name: Ryse
headline: The secondary market for real estate leases
description: Ryse is the only marketplace where investors who want to buy leases can trade with real estate operators who want to sell leases.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:machine-learning; industry:marketplace; industry:b2b; industry:proptech; location:new-york

founders.name: Sean Mitchell, Founder
founders.description: Sean Mitchell went to Florida A&M University where he received a bachelor's in Business Administration and minor in math and computer programming. He started his career in 2009 at JP Morgan's Chief Investment Office, where he was part of a 5-person team that managed a $30B structured mortgage backed security portfolio. Sean began working for Corbin Capital Partners in 2012, where he managed a $300M in a structured credit portfolio. Sean co-founded REZI (YC W17), a tech-enabled property manager.

founders.name: Harsh Yadav, Founder
founders.description: Harsh earned his MS, Computer Engineering from Rutgers, New Brunswick, New Jersey in 2010. He also has a Bachelor of Technology degree from the National Institute of Technology in Allahabad, India. Harsh began his career at Consumer Reports in 2010; helping transitioning Consumer Reports print media to web first world. In 2013, Harsh joined Torrential Inc., a digital media company as their VP, Engineering. Harsh co-founded REZI (YC W17), a tech-enabled property manager.

# A private network for real estate operators to connect with capital partners.
Ryse provides software to facilitate search & discovery, payment processing, and transaction-level reporting between real estate operators and capital partners. 
[Get Rent Advance](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/rysemarket.retool.com/p/d2o>)
![A ryse product image showing a dashboard and financial information.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/65f27853bb030e2ac22cdaca_ryse_mockup_v3.svg)
###### How It Works
## Scale with unlimited growth capital from our partners.
Ryse empowers real estate operator in flex-living and flex-working verticals to find, connect, and transact with corporate partners on strategic leasing opportunities at scale.
### Scale
Go further, faster, with guaranteed cash flow from strategic corporate partners. Grow your business with Ryse, without balance sheet risk, and with a lower cost of capital.
### Plug nâ€™ Play
Plug into our platform with full optionality. Leverage Ryse only on the projects you need to under our a-la-carte model to guarantee cash flow, eliminate balance sheet risk, and optimize your portfolio.
### Differentiate
Upgrade your operations with a purpose-built modern integration. Our products empower real estate operators to differentiate themselves in an increasingly competitive and volatile market environment.
### Guaranteed Cashflows
Receive guaranteed cash flows for new developments, value add renovations, and stabilized assets. Cash flows can be brought forward or smoothed over the multi-year term of the guarantee.
### Back Office OS
Optimize your back office operations with world class technology and a suite of modular solutions purpose-built for real estate. Whether you're looking for growth capital, payment processing, or data management, Ryse has a solution for you.
###### Our Process
## Operators can be up and running, with payments flowing in as little as 60 days.
Our streamlined process is designed to get cash flowing to your projects today.
[Due Diligence](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)
[Due Diligence](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)
14 days
[Pricing Proposal](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)
14 days
[Onboarding](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)
28 days
[Payments Begin](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)
[Start Tab](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Due Diligence](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Pricing Proposal](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Onboarding](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Payments Begin](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
### Master Lease Agreements
### Property Information
### Customer Leases + Performance
Send due diligence materials including master lease agreements, rent rolls, and performance history to get started.
Within two weeks, you'll receive a Guarantee Proposal from one of Ryse's corporate partners.
Receive and e-sign our standard Ryse Subscription Agreement with just a few clicks to become an official Ryse member.
Guaranteed payments start flowing within weeks of signing your agreement. As part of your membership, you'll have full access to a personalized dashboard, performance reporting, unlimited future proposals, and ongoing support.
###### Ryse Advance
## Differentiate your business by providing liquidity to your property owners.
Earn more every month by offering your owners up to $50K against their future rent collections, funded and powered by Ryse. See how much you can earn with the calculator below.
Units Under Management
You must have at least 1 unit under management
Average Monthly Rent
Minimum monthly rent is $500
**Potential Annual Earnings**
##  $0 / year
Your Take Rate
15.0%
[Get Ryse Advance](https://www.rysemarket.com/<#>)

###### About Ryse
## We're on a mission to transform the real estate industry, for good.
Ryse was founded in 2024 with the vision to improve end-user experiences within the real estate industry through providing a more efficient and scalable growth strategy through corporate partners for leading real estate operators.
[![Allegis logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/65f2915200d8bf4b9808497a_allegis.svg)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/www.allegiscapital.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/66bbcc64c33fa25e2a2fa78f_BV_Logo_Transparent%201.png)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/www.brightventures.io/fund>)[![Elevate Capital logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/65f290a1870cb15ee31ebdef_elevate.svg)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/elevate.vc/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/66bbcba1473137c4514fe888_nvp.svg)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/nvpcap.com/>)[![Tuesday VC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/65f2911a53f7c30d8d41ff5b_tuesdayvc.svg)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/www.tuesday.vc/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/66ccb622eebd46491cef8436_9afaed44-b0d7-4a04-8582-9de8935b06ec.png)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/66ccb6191e3047b93fb71fd0_Singularity_Logo_Retina.png)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/singularitycapital.us/portfolio/>)[![Y Combinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e65b658d85c45c925b4793/65f07cf583de0a9fd2019a0a_ycombinator-ar21.svg)](https://www.rysemarket.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)

generated_description:
**Ryse: Revolutionizing the Real Estate Leasing Space**

Founded in 2024 and situated in the bustling metropolis of New York, Ryse is trailblazing a new path in the secondary market for real estate leases. As part of Y Combinatorâ€™s W24 batch, this fintech startup is carving out a niche by being the only marketplace where investors keen on buying leases can effortlessly connect with real estate operators looking to sell them.

With a compact yet capable team of 13 under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, Ryse is rooted in its mission: to transform how leases are exchanged and open up new opportunities for both landlords and investors. The startup is riding the wave of innovation with its emphasis on machine learning and modern technology, which is essential in the fintech and proptech sectorsâ€”a hotbed of growth right now.

So, what does Ryse actually do? They provide a platform that streamlines the leasing process for real estate operators, facilitating not just the trading of leases but also offering software for search, payment processing, and transaction reporting. In short, Ryse is like the bridge connecting real estate operators with capital partners, ultimately aiming to enhance their liquidity and growth potential.

Key services include:

1. **Guaranteed Cash Flows**: Operators can secure consistent income from leases, enabling them to focus on growth without the fear of balance sheet risk.
   
2. **Streamlined Onboarding**: After a quick due diligence process, operators can start receiving payments within just 60 days. 

3. **Flexibility**: With their a-la-carte model, operators can engage with Ryse for specific projects, ensuring they only pay for what they need.

4. **Back Office Optimization**: Offering a suite of modular solutions aimed at enhancing operational efficiency, whether itâ€™s data management or payment processing.

The bottom line is that Ryse is about enabling real estate operators to differentiate themselves in a competitive market by providing them the tools to manage leases better and tap into new revenue streams, like offering liquidity against future rent collections. 

For those intrigued by what Ryse has to offer, their website provides a wealth of information and resources, making it easy to explore opportunities for partnership and engagement.

In a nutshell, by connecting the dots in the real estate leasing market, Ryse isnâ€™t just helping operatorsâ€”it's setting the groundwork for a more efficient, scalable, and profitable industry. Check them out at [rysemarket.com](https://www.rysemarket.com/), and stay tuned, because they're just getting started.
